title: Watashi no Naka no Gensou-teki Sekaikan Oyobi Sono Kengen wo Souki Saseta Aru Genjitsu de no Dekigoto ni Kansuru Ichi Kousatsu

alternative_titles.ja: 私の中の幻想的世界観及びその顕現を想起させたある現実での出来事に関する一考察

synopsis:
As a part of the band Irodorimidori, Nagi Kotoboke always seems laid-back as she dons her headphones while playing her keyboard. However, lying beneath her quiet demeanor is a girl whose imagination extends into a spectacular and vast fantasy wonderland.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]
